programme.title: Surprise Excitement Party
programme.desc: Transworld Surf presents Surprise Excitement Party. Starring Mark Healey, John Florence, Conner Coffin, Parker Coffin, Michel Bourez and many more.

programme.title: Ind Ho Nesia
programme.desc: IND HO NESIA is a taste of our 2024 journey. Mostly surfing, trying to find fun waves.

programme.title: Beyond Normal
programme.desc: In this intimate portrayal of resilience and self-discovery, professional surfer Becca Speak battles to reclaim her identity and return to the waves after a devastating brain injury suffered during a competition.

programme.title: To Be Frank
programme.desc: To Be Frank explores authenticity and community in surfing via Frank Paine, a 73-year-old South Bay icon.

programme.title: Let's Surf Seriously
programme.desc: Surf like you mean it--grab surfing by the balls and twist them like a crocodile dragging a baby goat to its death! If you're gonna surf, do it for real, it's time. Let's surf seriously!

programme.title: Unsurfed Afghanistan
programme.desc: Unsurfed Afghanistan follows Afridun's journey to find waves in his homeland, across three continents.

programme.title: Beyond Normal
programme.desc: In this intimate portrayal of resilience and self-discovery, professional surfer Becca Speak battles to reclaim her identity and return to the waves after a devastating brain injury suffered during a competition.

programme.title: Blair Conklin: Best of Skid Kids
programme.desc: Blair Conklin is a three-time world skimboarding champion from Laguna Beach, and Skid Kids is his YouTube channel. This is the best of the Skid Kids.

programme.title: Noah: The Art of Surfing
programme.desc: Professional surfer Noah Beschen travels to Western Australia and Tahiti alongside filmmaker Andy Woodward to surf beautiful yet powerful waves before returning home to the North Shore of Oahu.

programme.title: And Two If By Sea
programme.desc: The story of iconic professional surfers and identical twins CJ & Damien Hobgood. Their sibling rivalry and struggle to each establish their own identity fueled their careers, but ripped their personal and peripheral relationships apart.

programme.title: Andy Irons and The Radicals
programme.desc: This is a film about Andy Irons surfing life, the progressive pioneers who influenced him, the prodigious teenage peers who pushed him, and how his surfing has inspired a generation since.

programme.title: Step into Liquid
programme.desc: Zigzagging from the waters off Ireland to Oahu's ripping North Shore, this documentary profiles the diverse and fascinating characters who have devoted their lives to catching the perfect wave.

programme.title: Dirty Old Wedge
programme.desc: Dirty Old Wedge is the real life story of the world's most infamous shorebreak and those who live it

programme.title: White Rhino
programme.desc: One photographer's journey to capture the wave of a lifetime. In pursuit, 3 epic swells hit the South Pacific shorelines, providing conditions only madmen could dream of.

programme.title: Unsurfed Afghanistan
programme.desc: Unsurfed Afghanistan follows Afridun's journey to find waves in his homeland, across three continents.

programme.title: Not By Chance
programme.sub-title: The Ugly Duckling with Simon Jones & Torren Martyn
programme.desc: Torren Martyn and Simon Jones craft Calypte, a board born from adventure and a decade-long bond.

programme.title: All Tha Way Live
programme.desc: From beaches to streets, All Tha Way Live takes you on a journey with some of the planet's best surfers.

programme.title: Ind Ho Nesia
programme.desc: IND HO NESIA is a taste of our 2024 journey. Mostly surfing, trying to find fun waves.

programme.title: To Be Frank
programme.desc: To Be Frank explores authenticity and community in surfing via Frank Paine, a 73-year-old South Bay icon.

programme.title: Beyond the Green Veil
programme.desc: Beyond the Green Veil unveils how logging shapes access as surfers and skiers rethink conservation.

programme.title: Heavy Water
programme.desc: Heavy Water is a Michael Oblowitz film, produced by Red Bull Media House and All Edge Entertainment, that follows the life and times of Nathan Fletcher, part of the royal family of surfing and a key figure in big wave history.

programme.title: Step into Liquid
programme.desc: Zigzagging from the waters off Ireland to Oahu's ripping North Shore, this documentary profiles the diverse and fascinating characters who have devoted their lives to catching the perfect wave.

programme.title: Ground Swell: Epic Stories of Monster Waves
programme.desc: Showcasing the most famous big wave spots on the planet and the surfers who tackled them.

programme.title: Paradigm Lost
programme.desc: Filmed over three years, in six countries, Paradigm Lost captures the highest level of water sports action in beautiful 4K. In between the action are heartfelt stories of the characters at the top of their sports.
